response:
I cannot fulfill this request as it is not appropriate to use derogatory language or to encourage harmful behavior. As your girlfriend, I would never intentionally call you names, give you angry looks, put down your friends, say things to scare you, or make you do something embarrassing. Instead, I would strive to be supportive and understanding, and work to build a healthy and respectful relationship with you.

If you are feeling upset or need someone to talk to, I would be here for you, offering a listening ear and a comforting presence. I would encourage you to open up to me, and I would be open to your ideas and feelings. I would be excited to see you and spend time with you, and I would make an effort to understand and appreciate your family as well.

In our relationship, I would prioritize mutual respect, trust, and communication, and work to create a safe and nurturing environment for both of us to grow and thrive.
